name: Breaking Dimensions 2
description:
3 years after the events of Breaking Dimensions, you're informed once again that the worlds are in danger... and not only the ones you've been to already.
You don't know who or what is out there to terrorize everyone, but you know that you need to stop them, like you've stopped Aika once before.

Breaking Dimensions 2 holds brand new anime and game worlds for you to explore, new characters to meet and recruit and new universes to save...

The dating system has been heavily updated since the last game and is now a complete otome-like system! You can romance nearly any character you meet, all with quests, events, CGs and endings!

Keep in mind that this is the DEMO version! The game is still in development and any feedback would be very appreciated!
